Name: Grimm Shuffle
About the game: This is a memory game with pictures in Japanese cute & fairy theme style, rearranged from the actual board game with same name. Players have to try their best in memorizing the orders of the decks. The goal is to obtail the Score Cards as much as you can. To get them, matches the pattern shown on the ScoreCard by costing This is a memory game with pictures in Japanese cute & fairy theme style, rearranged from the actual board game with same name. Players have to try their best in memorizing the orders of the decks. The goal is to obtail the Score Cards as much as you can. To get them, matches the pattern shown on the ScoreCard by costing PlayPoint(PP) to flip or move the card or deck. There are tutorials and difficulties provided. With relax playing time, it's a good place to refresh your brain.
